original_text: __details': "The TK4MB is the ultimate solution for modern and complex systems. It includes all functionality of __TECH16_, but adds connectivity Modbus RTU, the standard of industrial communication par excellence. This allows the regulator to become an intelligent node within a wider control network (PLC, SCADA, BMS). All operational data can be read in real time by a central control room, and parameters can be adjusted remotely. This not only allows constant monitoring of the health status of all compressors in the system, but also opens the doors to predictive maintenance. Aby analysing the historical data provided by TK4MB, it is possible to predict when a compressor is consuming too much oil or when a filter could be clogged, allowing to intervene before a failure occurs.", 'when_choose it': "It is the mandatory choice for medium and large refrigeration plants such as supermarkets, distribution centres, data centers and industrial plants. Any system operated by a PLC or a BMS should use the TK4MB to centralize control, optimize energy efficiency and implement advanced maintenance strategies in industry 4.0."}] table_sumsumsumsumsumming: {'headers': ['Caratteristica', '_TECH13___', 'TK4', '_TECH16__', '_TECH16___MB'], 'rows': [['Control Aautonomo', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Sì', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes', 'Yes, 'Yes', 'Yes, 'Yes', 'Configuration Parameter', 'No (Fissa) ', 'Sì' (via _TECH40__by via , 'Yes', 'H40_ LED_ and _TEC_T_T_Sol], , , 'F_T_of_T]] Local' (T], Local' (the (T] (T] (T], the system (T], the system (T], the , the , the , the , the , the system system (Tat (no, the , the , the , the system (no, the system (no, , BMS (no, BMS (no, BMS (no, BMS (no BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS], BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, , BMS, BMS, BMS, BMS, , , BMS, , , , , , , , , , , , , , BMS, BMS, BMS, , , , , , , , , BMS, , , , , , , ,

The TK4MB oil level controller offers advanced diagnostics and predictive maintenance capabilities, enabling real-time monitoring and remote parameter adjustment. It provides optimized control of refrigeration systems, ensuring improved overall efficiency and performance.

key_concepts: Modbus RTU connectivity for smart control
Real-time monitoring and remote parameter adjustment
Integration with PLC, SCADA, and BMS systems
iconic_quotes: Il TK4MB è la soluzione definitiva per impianti moderni e complessi.
Questo permette al regolatore di diventare un nodo intelligente all'interno di una rete di controllo più ampia (PLC, SCADA, BMS).
Analizzando i dati storici forniti dal TK4MB, è possibile prevedere quando un compressore sta consumando troppo olio o quando un filtro potrebbe essere intasato

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary benefit of using Modbus RTU connectivity on the TK4MB?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB offers real-time monitoring and remote parameter adjustment, enabling advanced diagnostics and predictive maintenance. This allows for optimized control of refrigeration systems and improved overall efficiency.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK4MB integrate with PLC, SCADA, and BMS systems?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB is designed to work seamlessly with these systems, providing a unified control platform for complex industrial applications. This enables real-time monitoring and remote parameter adjustment, ensuring optimal performance and efficiency.

qa_pairs.question: What are the key features of the TK4MB oil level controller?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB offers advanced diagnostics and predictive maintenance capabilities, including real-time monitoring and remote parameter adjustment. It also provides optimized control of refrigeration systems, ensuring improved overall efficiency and performance.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK4MB address common issues in industrial refrigeration applications?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB provides advanced diagnostics and predictive maintenance capabilities, enabling early detection and prevention of common issues such as compressor oil leaks or filter blockages. This ensures optimal performance and efficiency, reducing downtime and improving overall system reliability.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure range for TK4MB?
Which refrigerants are compatible with TK4MB?
metadata.summary: The TK4MB oil level controller offers advanced diagnostics and predictive maintenance capabilities, enabling real-time monitoring and remote parameter adjustment. It provides optimized control of refrigeration systems, ensuring improved overall efficiency and performance.
